doi-housing-improvement-program.title: Financial Assistance and Social Services (FASS)
doi-housing-improvement-program.headline: Financial Assistance and Social Services (FASS)
doi-housing-improvement-program.summary: This program provides direct assistance to American Indians and Alaska Natives, including financial assistance, child assistance, burial assistance, emergency assistance, and adult care assistance.
doi-housing-improvement-program.eligibil: You are a member of a federally recognized American Indian Tribe or an Alaska Native.
